Text: So proud to be able to share the stage with @DerrickforVA to help our good friend @MattForVA  kick off his campaign for State Senate at @gourmeltz  yesterday! It was amazing to see so many of our supporters there rallying behind Matt Strickland!! https://t.co/9sKZ3ZQ4ii
